description:
At our law office, Norton & Spencer, P.C., we seek settlements and verdicts for victims of catastrophic accidents and personal injuries. We work with clients in Kansas City, Missouri, who have been hurt in car and truck crashes, construction mishaps, and nursing home neglect. In one noteworthy case, our firm won a $22 million jury verdict for a client who suffered permanent injuries in a tractor-trailer accident. Before the trial, the defense did not make a settlement offer. We also handle medical malpractice cases involving the following:

  • Failure to diagnose
  • Medication errors
  • Misdiagnosis
  • Nerve damage
  • Surgical errors
  • Unnecessary surgery

Our law office is highly regarded by both peers and courts. Our awards and memberships include Super Lawyers, American Association for Justice, Missouri Association of Trial Attorneys, National Academy of Personal Injury Attorneys, The National Trial Lawyers: Top 100 and American College of Trial Lawyers. Additionally, partner John Norton holds the highest possible rating of AV Preeminent* from Martindale-Hubbell.

Norton & Spencer, P.C., is pleased to take cases in the greater Kansas City metropolitan area, as well as Missouri and Kansas statewide. We offer a candid and free initial consultation to all prospective clients, no matter the scope or complexity of their situations. Our law office welcomes credit cards as an accepted form of payment.

* AV®, AV Preeminent®, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell® is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell® Peer Review RatingTM fall into two categories - legal ability and general ethical standards
